overview:
Mr. Richard Seewald is a Partner at ALPHA Associates; a Zurich based global private equity investor with over USD 2 billion under management. He is responsible for direct investments, secondary transactions and primary fund commitments and is a member of the firm’s Investment Committee.

Richard has invested in growth companies in the TMT sectors, financial services sector, retail sector and as a member of the board of directors of AVG Technologies, Cognitive Security, The 60K Group and as Chairman of BKS - Nej TV. Focus is on business strategy, product development, operations management, business development, finance, board management, capital raising, press strategy and central and eastern Europe and Russia.
